participant_1.background:
I am slightly overweight because I spend too much time watching television and not enough time exercising.
My most valuable possession is my Tigers baseball jersey.
I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister.
I listen to music that helps me calm down and release my stress.
I take a deep breath and remind myself that I'm strong and capable.

participant_2.background:
I am going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
I remember always being told to eat my eggs and bacon, even when I didn't like them.
I love my dog so much.
i recently broke my leg.

content.text: Not much, just going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands.
That sounds awesome! What bands are you going to see?
I'm going to see The Killers, The 1975, and The Lumineers.
Oh man, I love The Killers! I've seen them in concert a couple times. They're great live.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
How did you get into them?
I heard their song "Mr. Brightside" on the radio when I was in high school and I was hooked.
That's a great song! I love the music video for it.
What other bands do you like?
I also like The 1975, The Lumineers, The National, Arcade Fire, and The Strokes.
Wow, we have similar taste in music! I like all of those bands too.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same music as me.
Yeah, it is. I'm going to have to go now, but it was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a nice day.
